thread.title: Would You Go on a 90-Day Sex Fast?
thread.title_full: Would You Go on a 90-Day Sex Fast? | Maxim

author: Gabriella Paiella
title: Would You Go on a 90-Day Sex Fast?
text:
You know how when one of your friends goes on a diet, it seems to be the only thing he or she can talk about? Every casual conversation manages to steer towards how life-changing it is to give up carbs or eat like cavemen did.
Terry Crews seems to be guilty of the same sort of thing — only he gave up sex for 90 days, which he spilled to HuffPost Live on Wednesday .
The former football player and Brooklyn Nine-Nine actor said that for 90 days it was “ no sex , all relationship, all talk, all cuddle” with his wife Rebecca.
Which raises a few key questions from me, mostly could they do hand and mouth stuff? Could they jerk off? 90 days is a very, very long time — certainly longer than the 40 days during which a very horny Josh Hartnett didn't have sex in 2002 .
Crews added, “I found that at the end of that 90 days...I knew who she was, and it wasn't about 'Let's go out because I know I'm gonna get some sex later.' It was like, 'Let's go because I want to talk to you. I want to know you'."
In all honesty, “let’s go out because I know I’m gonna get some sex later” might be the only reason why I leave the house. But to each his own.
